TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemEvents_10_ReplyAllEventHandler(object Response, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemEvents_10_ReplyAllEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemEvents_10_ReplyAllEventHandler(Response As Object, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void ItemEvents_10_ReplyAllEventHandler(System::Object ^ Response, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: The new item being sent in response to the original message.
False when the event occurs. If the event procedure sets this argument to True, the reply all operation is not completed and the new item is not displayed.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
